name: Skeletal Skism
description:
Play as a skeleton king and lead your army into battle

Skeletal Skism is a PVP Real-Time Tactics game.
Buy items to grow stronger: win by out-itemizing your opponent and destroying their throne.

- Over 50 unique items

- Counter your opponent's build and exploit their weaknesses

- Adapt mid-battle by changing your build whenever you desire

- Endless playstyles and possibilities


Join the fight today
